resources.string: WARNING\nShort intervals might decrease battery lifetime!
Do you want to delete this schedule?
Thank you for downloading this application.
In the main screen you can create and delete schedules.\nCreate a schedule by selecting the “plus”-icon placed in the top-right.
Delete a schedule by holding down a schedule in the list until a dialog appears, asking for your confirmation.

When creating a schedule, there are two main choices. Make a schedule based on a time schedule (and perhaps also locations), or a schedule based only on locations. Choose either by selecting the “Schedule” or “All day” checkbox.

1. Select an adapter (either Bluetooth or WiFi) to be controlled by the schedule.
2. Select a time of day that you wish to start the adapter.
3. Select a time of day that you wish to stop the adapter.
4. Select days to repeat the schedule. !! (if no days are selected, the schedule will be repeated every day)
5. *Specify locations that the phone should be in proximity of, in order for the adapter state to be changed (on/off). Selected locations can quickly be viewed at the bottom of the screen.
6. *Specify settings for proximity (in meters) for locations selected above. 

* - Optional

1. Select an adapter (either Bluetooth or WiFi) to be controlled by the schedule.\n2. Specify locations that the phone should be in proximity of, in order for the adapter state to be changed (on/off). Selected locations can quickly be viewed at the bottom of the screen. One location must be chosen!\n3. Specify settings for proximity (in meters) for locations selected above

Create a location by selecting the “plus”-icon placed in the top-right. 
1. Enter a name for the location.
2. *Have GPS enabled and press “Get GPS location”.
3. *Enter an address manually.
4. Press “Save and back”. 

* - Optional.

Delete location by holding down a location in the list until a dialog appears, asking for your confirmation.
(accurate address is important,\notherwise use the gps button)
Push to edit\nHold down to delete
Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun
